extension.name: Automatically assign the gender of a contact based on their prefix
extension.description: So Mrs and Ms. -> Female and Mr -> Male when not set. This assumes the default values for the gender and prefix (but works if translated). Use at your own risk if you have altered either option group values!!! This extension doesn't change the gender of a contact if its already defined
extension.comments: Did I mention that it WILL mess your database if you have changed the default values for gender or prefix?
